name: SetPlayerShopName
notes: This function does not support casino scripts.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Loads or unloads an interior script for a player (for example the ammunation menu).

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to load the interior script for.

params_body.name: shopname[]
params_body.description: The shop script to load. Leave blank ("") to unload scripts.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
DisableInteriorEnterExits: Disable the yellow door markers.
 SetPlayerInterior: Set a player's interior.
